synopsis.text:
Another synopsis:

After losing his parents, Yuushi Inaba finds himself living with his uncle, feeling like an unwelcome guest. Eager to start anew, he plans to move into a dormitory for high school, only to have it burn down before he can. With limited options and funds, he stumbles upon Kotobuki-so, an affordable yet peculiar apartment complex. To his surprise, the building is inhabited by an assortment of supernatural beings, including ghosts, youkai, and mononoke. Alongside a fellow high schooler named Akine, who possesses the ability to exorcise evil spirits, Yuushi must navigate his unconventional living situation and embrace his extraordinary daily life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
